The Man Called Noon (1973) - XviD


DVD Rip : English
Western
It is based on a 1970 Louis L Amour novel

Cast: Richard Crenna, Stephen Boyd, Rosanna Schiaffino, Farley Granger
Directed by:Peter Collinson
 

Noon is a gunfighter who has become amnesiac. Helped by Rimes, an outlaw who has befriended him, he tries to figure out who he is actually. It gradually appears that his wife and kid have been murdered. As time goes by, Noon also recalls a fortune hidden somewhere. Niland, a scheming judge, and Peg Cullane, a greedy man who will do everything to prevent Noon and Rimes from achieving their end while Fan Davidge, a woman living in a ghost town, will support them.
